```{r, include = FALSE}
.url_gh <- function(x) {
  url_git <- git2r::remote_url(remote = "origin")
  url_web <- gsub(".git$", replacement = "", x = url_git)
  file.path(url_web, "blob/master/_R", x)
}
```
